review: Now I was in need of buying a new TV, after checking the prices I found that smart TV's were about double the price of ordinary TV's. So I bought a bigger 1080p TV. And decided to buy the chromecast. Set up was a breeze and don't let the small size fool you it streams Netflix, YouTube and a bunch of other stuff. Without a doubt one of the best purchases I've ever made. Also loving the 3 free months of Google all access.
author: Eric Juarez

review: I am one of the people who purchased the Logitech Revue device with the keyboard and we like that so much we really haven't used this device like we should.  My wife uses with her I-pad and I-phone and so you can only stream a few things like Netflix etc. currently with this device.  My hope is they will add more streaming options with apple products.  The pros are how small the device is which makes it perfect to plug into your TV via HDMI port.  Pretty self explanatory on how to set up and use the device.  Again if we didn't already own the Logitech Revue we would be using this a lot more I am sure.

review: Seriously, I can't believe that this thing is this inexpensive, and this small.Easy to setup, works great right away.  Truly a cool piece of technology.  And good on Google for including both a HDMI extender cable and your choice of a USB or power adapter.  Very nice, Google.
author: S. Kosloske

review: Have had this about 2 weeks and its nothing special. Setup was straightforward  and easy but unless you have Netflix or Hulu the two big ones, then there really isn't much content to take advantage of the casting functionality, casting from my Android phones is fairly easy and for the most part the picture quality was pretty decent without any stops or starts. Casting from my PC is a different story though, it borders on unwatchable  at times. After how long this device has been available there should definitely be more things to cast by now.look the price is great but the lack of things to cast makes it just Ok
